import classes from "./HouseCard.module.css" import {Link} from "react-router-dom" import {deleteHouse} from '../../../../api/HouseApi' import AuthContext from '../../../../store/auth-context'; import {useContext } from "react" const HouseCard = props => { const authCtx = useContext(AuthContext) const params = useParams() const id = params.id const deleteHandler = () => { deleteHouse() } return (

{props.item.category}

{props.item.location}

view
Edit
Add Room
Delete
) } export default HouseCard
